programme.title: Ghostly Applause for a News Blackout
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke evaluates the news blackouts over the Israel and Palestinian peace talks.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke evaluates the effect of the news blackouts surrounding the Israel and Palestinian peace talks and reflects on their joint history and turbulent relationship.
